posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:
2) Your age: 15
3) Your location: California, PST (pacific standard time)
4) Current In-Game Name: [NNJG] TweeKie
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: STEAM_0:0:39625896
6) How did you find out about NNJG: my brother
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: 3 months
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: i can be a moderator for jailbreak, I'm on at least 2-3 hours a day, if not every other day.
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: I have been an active forum member/Jailbreak player. My time has slowed down on playing until we got the new server, and I am glad we can play JB without it being gone for more then 2 days.
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for: moderator
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: i own a blue snowball, and i use my mic Very frequently.
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: I have been an active member in the forums, and jailbreak community. Not for mod, or anything of that sorts, I just love the community. I could help bring peace within the jailbreak server, as being a moderator

Although I already recommended him, I do give him strong support. So yeah, +support.

Welcome to the [NNJG]Administration Team!
Please message me on steam to receive moderator.
Please read http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=103&t=3372 and http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/styled/styled-3/ to get familiar with what we do.
Thanks, and welcome to the team!
